name: PixelTrox
description:
PixelTrox is a game where you must remove pixels who want to take your monitor. When you start the level and time begins to fall, press Z to remove pixels with a wicked blast.

PixelTrox has 5 levels of increasing complexity, each with less time to remove pixels. If you play from the beginning, a portion of the remaining time of the previous level will be added to the current time, that way you will have more time to remove pixels.
